sentences.en: I told uncle I was putting three hundred on Daffodil.
sentences.cn: 我告诉过叔叔我在水仙身上下注三百英镑.

sentences.en: I was right. On top of a daffodil, sat a bee.
sentences.cn: 确实是虫子,我猜对了. 在一朵水仙花上, 落着一只蜜蜂.

sentences.en: Let mind dance with dew daffodil.
sentences.cn: 让思想和露珠,百合起舞.

sentences.en: March brings breezes loud and shrill, stirs the dancing daffodil.
sentences.cn: 三月带来尖叫的风,吹拂着翩翩起舞的水仙花.

sentences.en: Perennial border such as daffodil, daisy, lily, phlox, iris, etc.
sentences.cn: 栽种多年生植物(如水仙花 、 雏菊 、 百合 、 福禄考 、 蝴蝶花等)的条形绿化带.

sentences.en: Tender green daffodil leaves poke through the grass, some even showing yellow buds.
sentences.cn: 嫩绿色的黄水仙的叶子从草丛中探出身来, 有些水仙甚至展露出它们黄色的花蕾.

sentences.en: The 10-piece set features a raised and gilded oak leaf border with acorns and the national symbols of the daffodil, rose and thistle on a pale blue base.
sentences.cn: 这个陶瓷10件套的边缘用向上攀升的镀金橡树叶和橡树果作装饰，中间是国家的标志：水仙花，玫瑰和淡蓝色基底上的蓟。

sentences.en: The daffodil belongs to the genus Narcissus.
The flower was something in the mature of a daffodil.
The flower was something in the nature of a daffodil.
The lace design incorporated rose, thistle, daffodil and shamrock — the emblems of England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland.
sentences.cn: 蕾丝图案上有玫瑰、蓟、水仙花和三叶草（英格兰、苏格兰、威尔士和北爱尔兰的象征）。

sentences.en: The October after Grandpa's death, I planted tulip and daffodil bulbs , snowdrops, crocuses, and bluebells.
sentences.cn: 在爷爷去世后的十月, 我种了一些郁金香、水仙 、 雪花莲 、 番红花及蓝铃花.

trans.tran_en: a tall yellow spring flower with a tube-shaped part in the middle
